mapper.update: update play set p_date = #{p_date}, p_score = #{p_score}, p_rts = #{p_rts}, s_idx = #{s_idx}, t_home = #{t_home}, t_away = #{t_away} where p_idx = #{p_idx}
mapper.select: select count(*) from play where p_idx like concat(#{year},#{month},'%')
select * from play where p_idx like concat(#{year_month},'%')
select s.s_name from play p inner join studium s on p.s_idx = s.s_idx where p.p_idx = #{p_idx};
